snippet: Pope Francis has established a committee of seven lay experts and one cleric to help carry out “the simplification and rationalization” of the Vatican’s departments.
abstract: Pope Francis establishes a committee of seven lay experts and one cleric to help improve the Vatican's finances and transparency.
lead_paragraph: Pope Francis has established a committee of seven lay experts and one cleric to help carry out “the simplification and rationalization” of the Vatican’s departments.

headline.main: Panel to Study Vatican’s Finances and Transparency
headline.print_headline: Italy: A Monitor for Vatican Finances
